column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I really enjoyed this place.  They take great pride in making cocktails absolutely correct with the highest level of ingredients.  That alone is reason enough to have your drinks here.  I went here for a business meeting and the menu looked so good we ended up not going to our dinner place but eating here.  I am happy we did.  Everything we tried was outstanding
column5: and the snapper.  The snapper was recommended by the waiter and the description did not seem appealing at all of a rye whiskey snapper something.   The result was a incredibly delicious snapper on a grain mixed with spinach.  It was perfectly done and the flavor was amazing.
